notes.text:
This update for cyrus-sasl fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-24407: Fixed SQL injection in sql_auxprop_store in plugins/sql.c (bsc#1196036).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: In Cyrus SASL 2.1.17 through 2.1.27 before 2.1.28, plugins/sql.c does not escape the password for a SQL INSERT or UPDATE statement.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
